Item ID7368

Studded chaps (t) is a piece of trimmed studded leather armour and only obtained by completing Easy Treasure Trails or trading. They give identical bonuses as the regular Studded chaps, and as such are mostly effective for low-levelled pures.

Studded chaps (t) along with a Studded body (t) can be stored in a Treasure chest in the Costume room of a player-owned house under the name of Trimmed studded leather, in the Easy clue category.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-5+6
 Defence bonuses
+15+16+17+6+16

[[File:Studded chaps (t) detail.png|left|90px]]'''Studded chaps (t)''' is a piece of [[trimmed studded leather armour]] and only obtained by completing [[Clue scroll (easy)|Easy]] [[Treasure Trails|Treasure Trail]]s or trading. They give identical bonuses as the regular [[Studded chaps]], and as such are mostly effective for low-levelled [[Combat pure|pures]].

Studded chaps (t) along with a [[Studded body (t)]] can be stored in a [[Treasure chest]] in the [[Costume room]] of a [[player-owned house]] under the name of Trimmed studded leather, in the [[Clue scroll (easy)|Easy clue]] category.
